title: Agricultural Credits (Appointment of Authorised Agency) Order, 2014
content:
7th November, 2014 Statutory Instruments 161
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 59 OF 2014
The Agricultural Credits Act, 2010
(Act No. 35 of 2010)
The Agricultural Credits Appointment of Authorised
Agency) Order, 2014
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section six of the
Agricultural Credits Act, 2010, the following Order is hereby made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Agricultural Credits (Appointment
of Authorised Agency) Order, 2014. Title
2. ZAMACE Limited is appointed as the authorised agency
for purpose of section six of the Act. Appointment
of authorised
agency
W. SIMUUSA,
LUSAKA Minister of Agriculture
4th November, 2014 and Livestock
[MAL.64/9/2]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K2,000 each
162 Statutory Instruments 7th November, 2014
